res: Iđit. Jo lea oktage gáfe vuoššan? ☕
Ipmel atti! Miison otne galgá leat iđitborramuššan? 😋🍴🥞
I personally find boxers to be more comfortable, but you do you. Bures boahtin! <:samiflag:650487218984714251>
Seems like we have something in common, you and I. Buorre boahtem! <:sami_heart:656285100316557333>
Yeah, you'll fit right in. Tiõrv pueʹttem! <:samiflaground:650968790699606037>
You know they say that I died in 1921, but actually Jullan keeps me in a jar in his basement.

Here's my favourite drink, usually the crowning touch on my intoxication. Thread carefully with it: ```fix
_____ Minttu Kakáo _____
- 3 cl Minttu (Peppermint or Black Mint)
- 2 cl Disaronno Amaretto (this makes the drink fancier than it has any right to be)
- 1 bag of Rett i Koppen Sjokoladedrikk
- 2 dl boiling water
- 0.5 tsp cinnamon
- 0.25 tsp cardamom
Put everything in a large Moomins™ cup in the given order and continuously mix with a teaspoon. Drink it while it's hot!```
